name: List
heading: Easily create nicely looking lists, which come in different styles.
description:
Modifiers

To display the list in a different style, just add a modifier class to the the .uk-list class. The modifiers of the List component are not combinable with each other.
usage: To apply this component, add the .uk-list class to an unordered or ordered list. The list will now display without any spacing or list-style. [uk-list-line] [uk-list-space]
